title: How to get free Twitch Bits - Quora

response.answer_text: Click on someone’s stream, press the “Get Bits” button, and there should be an option to watch in ad in exchange for bits. On the app, each ad will give you 2 bits. On a computer, you will usually get 5 or 10, but will rarely get 15 or even 25. Other than that, I do not believe there is any other way to get free bits.

Watching ads on stream will get you 2–5 bits each, maybe more. However there is a survey system Twitch has called Twitch RPG, it often awards 500 (though sometimes less, sometimes more) bits after you complete a survey. It will take a while for you to access these bits, but they are free!
Click on the bit logo, go to buy bits, click on watch ads. If the button is greyed out, then all the bits for that day were given out already.

response.answer_text: The easiest and safest way to earn free bits is by watching ads through Twitch’s ads to bits section. However you can only watch a certain number of ads each day and you earn only 1–5 bits per ad.
